website_summaries.verdict: Long lasting eyeshadows that are available in several different shade options.
pros: Available in 12 different quad color combinations
Lasts up to 16 hours without creasing
Can be used for both natural and dramatic eye looks
cons: Some shades have a lot of fallout

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyeshadow and have been wearing it for over ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow and have been wearing it for over 10 years. I have noticed in some packages a hard rock like substance occurs always on the number 2 colour and it makes the eye shadow difficult to use. This isn't an expensive product and usually I'll discard and buy another package but after years of the same issue this is growing tiresome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors not accurate in photos.
customer_reviews.text: One star because every color in the pallete looks to be in the 'wine' colored category when in fact this is the most neutral creme and brown pallete ever.
customer_reviews.author: lostcarolina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cracked all up! Two trays were loose. Strange. I ordered three different colors. One was fine. Just go to the store and get eyeshadow. I'm tired of contacting Amazon
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Can be used everyday! Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mini pallete. This is my everyday go to eyeshadow because it's neutral but can be smokey and bold of soft and natural. Colors last all day long! (Use with eyeshadow primer -sold separately found at sephora, cvs, Wal-Mart, Duane Reade, Rite-Aid etc..) Great for all seasons, and matches any color of clothing. Beautiful for hazel eyes! Go for it! Pros: long lasting Pigmented Affordable Neutral No fallout/ dust Soft Comes with applicator wand Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Reviewsforyou

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this Revlon product for a number of years. It lasts all day: I live in a very humid area and in my 60s. It is so nice that it is matted instead of all the frosted shadows out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall
customer_reviews.text: Great little pallet I love the colors. It comes with an applicator but I prefer my makeup brushes as they help to reduce the harshness that can come with the applicator provided. I prefer a more blended and subtitle look vrs dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: Other than the packaging, there is nothing good to say about this eyeshadow. I swatched it upon opening it, and knew right away it was junk. The three lighter colors barely showed up when I swatched, and the darkest color crumbled and was patchy. When I then used the palette on my eyes, I found the performance to be equally bad. It's powdery, patchy, the lighter colors have little color payoff, the darkest color is impossible to blend, and even with primer, the shadow creased and disappeared by mid-day. I threw this away after the first wearing. It is absolute junk.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: If it sounds too good to be true....
customer_reviews.text: If it sounds too good to be true it usually is! I got these or like 1.62 which I thought was a great buy but as I was afraid of the err came all busted apart and eyeshadow EVERYWHERE. Will return ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cunning

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a Xmas present! She loved the colors!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a co-worker as a Christmas present on Friday. She loved the colors! The product was well packaged and didn’t have any signs of damage. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eastwood House

customer_reviews.title: Same colors but didn't last 16 hr (only last 4-5hr)
customer_reviews.text: I picked the moonlit due to the natural tone colors. I was worry since some reviewers aaid they receive different color palettes but our order has the same colors as photo. Luckily!! However it didn't last 16 hr or all day for me. By afternoon (after 4-5hr), i have to do touch up and apply the eyeshadow again. The light white color eyeshadow is less than other 3 colors. Can you see it in my picture?! If Relvon didn't advertise this as 16 hr colorstay, i would rate this 4 stars. Since it states that the color stays16hr but didn't meet that expectation, i rate it 3 star. Little disappointed but I shouldn't expect high quality at $5.97.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Colors Not As Shown
customer_reviews.text: The Siren palette looks like shades of gray/silver but is actually plum/brown. I realize colors aren't as they appear online but this wasn't even close. If you page down the description there is another picture representing the color palettes, still not what I received but closer than the main pic at the top. Take your chances I guess. I did receive in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Grid

customer_reviews.title: Revlon ColorStay really lasts
customer_reviews.text: The actual color is more brown than expected; the photo appears more purple/plum, which I would have preferred. I do like this set anyway and it is very flattering for my skin tone. It applies very easily and it only takes a little product to cover completely. The shades also blend together very easily for a smooth color transition. It really does last all day with no creasing. I use with Revlon's colorstay eyeliner in black and Revlon Ultimate All In One Mascara in blackest black for a striking everyday look. I wear glasses and this really makes my eyes come alive behind the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Glass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've softened my stance a little regarding this product. I figured out that you need to make it more like a powder by scratching the surface. Makes it a little more useful. ORIGINAL: It takes a lot of effort to get the product onto the applicator. Can't really see it well when it is applied and by the end of the day there's nothing to take off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: One of my favs
customer_reviews.text: Not going knock it down because of this but the pallet for "Precious" has changed. It used to be more silvery purple. Now it's more mauve. I didn't realize this when I reordered it. I still love the new colors. They complement my bluish Viloet eyes just as well. Just thought people should know. This stuff stays on and blends well. Nice colors. Good price. The packaging is a little flimsy so becareful.(not enough to drop a star in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: KellyClayWoo

customer_reviews.title: There’s no pigment so the color doesn’t really show up
customer_reviews.text: It came in it was super cute I tried using it there is no pigment in it I had to use almost half of the color for it to really show is that color on my eye But if you just want a really natural look for it to look a barely different I recommend it because some days I’m just feeling like that and it’s good for those days What do you want to look like you didn’t put much effort into your make up or if you just wanna light make up day like you don’t really want to put much on it look like you have a lot on
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Method Was Poor
customer_reviews.text: Opened the envelope and each of the colors were totally broken up and was all over the little bubble wrap it was in. I am not going to send it back, as I don't want to have to pay probably as much as the eye shadow cost. A small box would have kept this from happening. This envelope didn't make the grade. This is only the second time this has happened. The other was a bottle of BBQ Sauce. Good Lord it was all over the place, and sticky, sticky, sticky!! What a mess. But overall I have been more than happy with the other zillion things I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Drew

customer_reviews.title: Revlon almost always makes a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Tops as far as drug store eye shadow. Wish the cost would stay as low.as I managed to get this one for as far as all shades go. Great smokey eye look and it actually lasts pretty well even without a base. Revlon is still one of the tops as far as drugstore, always hard to beat. This is a good one to have, even use the black as a liner with a damp brush. Multi tasking product.
customer_reviews.author: Manda M

customer_reviews.title: Good for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin on the neutral / warm side (NC10 in Mac,) and I purchased the "decadent" quad. I'm new to doing much in the way of eye makeup, so given my relative lack of experience + fair skin, this is a great choice for me - it would be easy for me to end up with eye makeup that looks garish. However, even on me, it does not seem very pigmented - I would not recommend it for anyone whose skin is much darker than "pasty."
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that I was able to scoop this up at such a low price! My “regular” eyeshadow had run out and I needed to replace it, but couldn’t find it in the stores. I looked at Amazon and stumbled across this Revlon eyeshadow. I’m so glad that I decided to give it a try! The powder is soft and goes on easily. It’s also easy to blend. It definitely stays put and lasts all day, but it is easily removed when you wash your face. I will be getting more of these in different colors palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lavender .... excellent quality at a drugstore price!
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for Lavender Eyeshadow after Clinique discontinued my favorite. Tried all the leading brands and good old drugstore Revlon turned out to be the best. Goes on smooth and silky; doesn't "crinkle" your lids like some. And the mid lavender color is perfect for lids; works well the the darker shade for blending along the crease of your eye or on its own. Great price... just got my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad at all
customer_reviews.text: These colors are really nice for just an every day look. They last a little longer than their regular shadow lines but you’ll still need to freshen up after a few hours wear. Doesn’t crease in the lid. Doesn’t blend really easily but can be worked with.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Louis

customer_reviews.title: NOT MATTE
customer_reviews.text: This I definitely NOT matte!! It has glitter. I ordered it because of mixed reviews. I returned it. I’m 60 and did not want shimmer or sparkle. If you want glitter, fine.
customer_reviews.author: Valex

customer_reviews.title: Colors look different.
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered looks different than what I actually got, not happy about that. I hate brown tones, that's what I got, even though this looks more of silver tones on the picture. Not getting these again. I ordered 3 different ones, only the purple one is actually purple. Other 2 are light brown & darker brown, not pink or silver tones.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Shadow Ever
customer_reviews.text: Have been unable to find this for a while now. I only found 1 about 6 months ago on another site and was price gouged for it. I couldn't believe you had it when I searched again. Thank You for having this and at the price it should be. I was able to buy 5 of them. I have worn this Revlon color stay 16 hour eye shadow for years. I have tried out many in between and this is still the one I love.
customer_reviews.author: Chessa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Got a few of these while they were on sale for gifts and I’m glad I did. The quality for the price was great and the colors are beautiful. I like that it’s small enough to fit in a makeup bag and not take up too much room but that you get a variety of colors. Definitely recommend for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow. I have brown eyes and I am constantly getting compliments on how pretty my eyes are and let’s just say we’ll, I’m past 50. These colors make my eyes look huge, smokey and very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shimmery colors!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I don't normally wear bright colors on my eyes, but I decided to give these a try. I applied the colors as suggested on the back and I think it turned out well. The colors are bright and pretty. In the photo is been wearing the shadow for a few hours so, it stays on well. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Best for beginners not for those with experience
customer_reviews.text: The presentation and colors are nice but the shadow itself is a little grain like. As you put it on the brush to your eye it’s not the best quality with the consistency of the product. Works for me as a beginner into makeup but definitely not for someone who knows makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s shimmery. Except for the darkest blue, which is matte.
customer_reviews.text: From the pics, the shadows look matte but when applied they get shimmery and the more you blend the more they sparkle. Not a problem if you don’t mind sparkly laugh lines. Still, it’s Revlon and it wears well, especially if you use primer. Since I paid less than 2.00 for each compact, I’m still ok with it. I’ll just use the matte blue and give the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: LaMann

customer_reviews.title: Decadent Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: *THIS REVIEW IS FOR THE DECADENT PALETTE ONLY* Got this powder hoping to play around with eye shadow combinations so that I would not waste my higher priced palettes. I've worked with several low cost eye shadows but this palette (Decadent) was horrible. Almost zero pigmentation even with a primer and base! There are much better options on Amazon, including knock-offs or other drugstore brands. Save your money unless you want your eyes to look like you lost the fight with a near colorless powder.
customer_reviews.author: Random Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find matte eye shadow so when I find a good one I try to stick with it. This Quad is nice although I don't think it is all matte. I do see a little shimmer but not enough that I would not purchase it again. I am not an expert on eye shadow and pigmentation etc. but for me these shadow colors are very nice and I do not ever touch them up throughout the day. I feel it was a good purchase and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: For me, these Revlon palettes are a great deal. I find them to be as comfortable and pretty as the higher-end department store brands but at a fraction of the cost. These go on smoothly, have a nice finish and last the whole day. At this price, I like to have one (or more : ) at home, one in my work tote and gym bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: SoCaLEE

customer_reviews.title: It came broken
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this and will be returning it because it came broken, I think the colors are a lot different then it shows in the pictures as well. Mayeb when I get a replacement the colors will look better when they are not broken,.
customer_reviews.author: Brailey Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not as it appears
customer_reviews.text: Colors do not appear as they do in the pictures instead of a deep maroon it is a brown. Applicator came and looked like they had already been used with product on the sponges.
customer_reviews.author: David Flores

customer_reviews.title: Darker than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Too dark. Colors are at least 3 or 4 shades darker than pictured. Not representative of what Colors I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This. Product. Stays. On. Forever. Seriously, just use a good primer on the lid first and this eyeshadow will set for hours. It stayed on throughout a very sweaty stage performance and all night when I crashed of exhaustion. The colors could be a little more vibrant, but they’re perfect for day-to-day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Soft shadow palate that doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I love These colors but the palate is soft and so it’s gone much quicker than a higher quality shadow palate. It also flakes all over I. The compact. I will Finish using it but don’t plan to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Idahoishome

customer_reviews.title: Cool combo
customer_reviews.text: Super cool neutral shades and blends easily. Works well with eye primer and can be easily removed with the help of eye makeup remover. The shades are natural and so many looks can be achieved. The smokey eyes are must try
customer_reviews.author: Anshika Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors; can't find in store anymore. Only issue was the powders got broken in shipping. Was disappointed with that; having to be very careful when I use so I don't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option
customer_reviews.text: Basic, drugstore quality nude eyeshadow set. I purchased this to keep in a spare makeup bag at my workplace. The colors are nice, mostly matte color. I do not like the applicator and suggest keeping a set of brushes handy. While this is not a highly pigmented set, I found that a couple of layers help the color last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The tones are very opaque, you have to use too much product to be able to appreciate the colour a little and it is not long lasting at all, in a short time it had already disappeared. Its consistency is very dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Hector C

customer_reviews.title: I use all the shades This is my new favorite nude quad
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! All nude. I actually purchased the Physician Formula matte collection quad as well but much prefer this Revlon quad. I find the colors on the Revlon more vibrant on my skin. I am a fair skinned black woman with hazel eyes. I use all the shades This is my new favorite nude quad.will keep on ordering. Thanks Revlon!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Does not show up on darker skin
customer_reviews.text: Because this was color stay , I thought it would stay on my skin for awhile. Turns out you could barely see it on my face and the little you did see wore off in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Great colors.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors, great product. I have no idea why it was so cheap. The colors look great now that I have let my hair go grey, so I bought another one. At this price, I couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Glad it was cheap
customer_reviews.text: Color barely shows up. I use over an eyeshadow primer but I would say this definitely does not last 16 hours even with the primer. Maybe 12 hours on a non-humid cooler day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the colors in this pallet. They are vibrant, not shiny, and stay put all day.
customer_reviews.author: kbh

customer_reviews.title: Broken mess
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and they were a mess when they got here. Broken and powder everywhere. I am not returning because I need what's left of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually really good. The only issue I have with it is it needed a better brush. I do recommend it to anyone and also have gifted several of these to others
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Small to carry packaging in purse
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, a little expensive for the size but nice and small packaging to carry in purse. Been using this product for years. Color hasn't changed.
customer_reviews.author: Mama's Good Boy

customer_reviews.title: Did not ship well- broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: The individual powders fell out when I opened the case. Fell on floor and broke off part of the make up. Very disappointed. The colors are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Symonds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Colors for work
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work colors. Great value. Just wish there was a way to buy the color I keep running out of! It’s so inexpensive that I just order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Allen

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. These eyeshadow last all day & evening. The colors are great & there is a chart on the back to illustrate how it’s supposed to be used.
customer_reviews.author: April Burke

customer_reviews.title: Subtle colors
customer_reviews.text: Subtle colors which Revlon has actually kept around for awhile. Nonetheless, I bought several compacts against the day they suddenly decide to drop the color!
customer_reviews.author: stonegarden

customer_reviews.title: Got it with a lightning deal
customer_reviews.text: Found this eyeshadow kit at a superb price and bought some which I intend to give as stocking stuffers. The kit came intact and well packaged and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Zhill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty combination of purple shades from light to dark.
customer_reviews.author: Ksgold

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one!
customer_reviews.text: The colors look pretty in the container, there is however very low pigmentation. This shadow needed to be layered with more than one application to get the true color.
customer_reviews.author: SCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color great price
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the quality of this product. It came double wrapped. Was flawless when I got it. The shades of brown were just perfect. Looking forward to reordering.
customer_reviews.author: joy A sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition bubble wrapped. The colors are really pigmented & not chalky. Easy to apply. Gorgeous colors. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Railyne Aellea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fall
customer_reviews.text: Great little pallet I love the colors. It comes with an applicator but I prefer my makeup brushes as they help to reduce the harshness that can come with the applicator provided. I prefer a more blended and subtitle look vrs dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day (I do use a light finishing spray) I get compliments on my eye make up all the time. Good product that doesn’t show pan within the first month of use
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great neutral palette. Easy to use and change up for a day or night look. Long lasting. Works great on warm skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great colors.
customer_reviews.text: Great colors and simple to use. I use Q-tips instead of the applicator provided. Once applied, I usually brush away the thickness of application and achieve the effect that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysanthemum

customer_reviews.title: Great eye color at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Revlon pallets, especially at such a great price. The colors are great and they don’t hurt my sensitive eyes. Bought a pallet in each color tone.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wife pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this, very happy. That’s all I need to know, and care about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed the product description said it was pigmented with 16 hr wear. It barely showed up. I won't buy any Revlons colorstay shadows again.
customer_reviews.author: Peppermint tea

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is how the eye showdown arrived. Wrapped in bubble wrap and not in original packaging. Looks used and clearly damaged. This was my second order. The first was fine, but this is unacceptable. Aside from the damage it looks “returned”‘or “used”.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whisenant

customer_reviews.title: Great product, concise package.
customer_reviews.text: Great combination of natural colors. I like that I have all colors in a small compact case that is easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: livie

customer_reviews.title: Great, if they don’t break.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors, my wife loves these, but out of the three I bought, one had the powder completely broken up on the inside. We know how to fix it but it’s a hassle especially with all the colors mixed. If it was boxed and prepared for shipping it would be and come to you perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old lady learning to apply make up lol
customer_reviews.text: I am 56 and don't wear make up. I'm about to learn lol. There is actually DIRECTIONS on this on how to apply to get different looks!!! I'm stoked!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa English

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed - UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Came broken up UPDATE: thanks for standing by product. Replaced item came packed correctly and product intact
customer_reviews.author: E10Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a quest for just the right color of purple eyeshadow....This was not the one ..but it does go on smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Patricia I Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description and make up does last. My one complaint is that it smudges easily and has more dark than light colors meaning if you do a smokey eye look everyday you are going to run out of the light colors way before you run out of the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Not super pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Not very pigmented, and wore off really quickly. I bought it on sale so I’m not out much money and it will work in a pinch but not for anything long
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Workman

customer_reviews.title: Applicator broke after only a few uses. Has to ...
customer_reviews.text: Applicator broke after only a few uses. Has to be reapplied several times during the day. Definitely not 16 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Broesder

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Quad
customer_reviews.text: I am in my early twenties, but have never been a big makeup wearer. I wanted to start exploring the eye shadow world and this is my first quad. I love that all of the colors are matte, giving me a really lovely, natural look. The color payoff on each of the shadows is great, and they are definitely long-lasting. Since I'd never really worn eye shadow in the past, I appreciated that the back of the packaging gave a visual tutorial of where to put which shade. I will definitely be buying more from this line.
customer_reviews.author: Dubtech Labs

customer_reviews.title: good colors
customer_reviews.text: Natural colors. Not too shiny or sparkly. Good for Elderly person such as Me. It was flaky , glittery and went on smooth. Complimenting accents. love the Shadow colors. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was on sale and I can always use neutral colors. Soft powder that stays on. I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping. Items arrived in great condition!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and both eye shadow palettes arrived in perfect condition. The colors of the eyeshadow are exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Keri O.

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Wear!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Great colors, applies easily and blends great. I can't believe the price I paid too!! I had bought others from Walgreens around the same time and this is by far my fav!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for for every day and small enough for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a travel-sized neutral pallet eye shadow pallet and this was perfect. The colors work well as eye and brow fill-ins. And the small size makes it travel or handbag friendly. I usually apply once in the morning and touch-up lightly if I have an all day affair. A good buy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte colors & great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding matte shadows and I am very pleased with this shadow compact. I use the two lighter colors on my lids and I use the taupe shadow on the left bottom to fill in my eyebrows - this makes it great for traveling, I do not use the applicators that came with, I use a brush for the shadow and an eyebrow applicator for the eyebrows then brush to blend it in. I only wish they would make more matte shadows!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celso Girl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the colors and couldn’t wait to try it. Unfortunately despite all the bubble wrap my item was broken. One of the colors shattered and spilled in the container making everything a hot mess.
customer_reviews.author: MIchelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap shadow so I wasn't expecting too much. White color is crumbles and 3 others are ok. Doesnt last long on your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Soft pinkish brown and coral
customer_reviews.text: Snagged this one on a coupon code and am glad I did. Pretty shades of pinkish brown. Reckon quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors very neutral
customer_reviews.text: It was broken up when I received it but my daughter put it together and did something to make it stick so she could use it .
customer_reviews.author: Jimee Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, fantastic quality & price.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of 4 shadows. Very blendable, not alot of fallout. Nice applicator. Great packaging, fantastic price! Very giftable, travels well. I purchased both color pallets, hoping they put out more colors.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Revlon eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not very dark so it takes quite a bit to show up. However it does last & it’s a true matte which can be hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the Revlon products and received compliments on the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the Revlon products and received compliments on the color. The price is right and I received fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Broken, loose powder mixed together. Useless
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a bubble wrap package today. So. I dont understand why it was so broken up. It is useless to me. The powder is broken up and dust in the little compartments mixed together. Ive bought this item before and didnt have this problem. But this time, the product is completely useless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Moore

customer_reviews.title: Too shimmery/glittery!
customer_reviews.text: I wish this had said it was shimmery/glittery. I prefer matte finishes in eye shadow and this is definitely *not* matte finish! The glittery stuff gets everywhere and accents all the things I don't want accented. The color and consistency are fine, but the glitter needs to go.
customer_reviews.author: C Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she loved it! Great price for it and fits amazing on her!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, but the silver shadow was broken when I opened the package. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Not your normal millennials

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyes pop
customer_reviews.text: Really like these shades for my green eyes. Easy to apply and make my eyes pop. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Volgirl

customer_reviews.title: Holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a stocking stuffer! Liked it so I purchased for myself to update my makeup too.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Crabill

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for these colors for a long time. I love these colors. Very usable,
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Cute eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I love to do this eyeshadow look: includes directions for a "day look" and a "night look"
customer_reviews.author: Simi Chechani

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle Face
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors, but I had so much shimmer fallout all over my face from the lighter colors.
customer_reviews.author: JpartTots

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheer simple beauty
customer_reviews.text: My eyeshadow arrived well- wrapped...the shades are elegant, soft and very blendable. A wonderful eye shadow combo
customer_reviews.author: Susan Klyber

customer_reviews.title: it just a okay product
customer_reviews.text: I guess this eye shadow is just okay, but to me it is considered as good product especially with this price
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors. It does flake a lot though when putting it on the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

product_meta.title: Revlon Colorstay 16 Hour Eye Shadow Quad, Addictive
product_meta.description: Color:AddictiveThe Revlon ColorStay 16 Hour Eye Shadow Quad is an expertly color coordinated palette for your most gorgeous eyes yet. Rich, velvety shadows blend smoothly for a beautiful, luxurious color that wears for up to 16 hours. Ophthalmologist tested and non irritating. These shadows won't crease, fade or smudge. Available in 12 palettes.
